FuncDef: This command specifies a log ID destination. This parameter is mandatory when configuring a log destination. This command instructs the events selected for the log ID to be directed to a specified file.

ParaDef.Info: Instructs the events selected for the log ID to be directed to the log-file-id. The characteristics of the log-file-id referenced here must have already been defined in the config>log>file log-file-id context. Values-1 to 99.
